summary: This module defines a collection of mock widget classes with various validation behaviors and a comprehensive test suite that exercises the BasicRegistrationFactory. The tests verify default selection, extra validation, handling of ambiguous matches, missing defaults, validation function errors, and interaction with external registries.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the functionality of the datatype registration factory by systematically testing its core features and edge cases, ensuring reliable object creation and error handling within the library.
